text:
@realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar https://t.co/qrqeOhnWNO

You should not have fired Dir. Bright of BARDA last week. He was tasked w/ dev of C19 vaccine and you have created delays, chaos, stress and have demoralized govt professionals. Haven’t you caused enough death and destruction? Resign or #25thAmendmentNow
